role.descr: more specific entity scanned, if in addition to ARG1

example.text: ...CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
example.amr: (c / ct-01 :ARG2 (a / and :op1 (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n / name :op1 "chest")) :op2 (a3 / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "abdomen")) :op3 (a4 / anatomical-site :name (n3 / name :op1 "pelvis"))))
